title: Rosetta Stone plus StackSkills Unlimited equal a lifetime of learning for $159.97.
content:
Macworld

The search for knowledge is eternal. So to prove it, you can open up a world of self-education including life skills that could really push you and your chosen career forward with The Unlimited Lifetime Learning Subscription Bundle ft. Rosetta Stone.

A PC Mag Editor’s Choice recipient for eight years in a row, Rosetta Stone has been called the most polished language learning app around. New subscribers get complete access to learning materials in all 24 languages in the Rosetta Stone archive, including popular choices like Spanish, French, and Chinese to more exotic options like Hebrew, Swedish, Turkish, or Vietnamese.

Rosetta Stone opts to get students speaking immediately, triggering natural contextual learning so students draw mental connections between the things they see and say. From there, interactive lessons allow Rosetta Stone’s proprietary TruACCENT speech recognition technology to analyze your speech at a rate of 100 times per second. Learners receive instant feedback to improve performance, sharpen their accents, and generally start sounding more and more like a native speaker.

Along with a lifetime of Rosetta Stone access, this package also includes a full lifetime of membership to StackSkills Unlimited Online Courses’ roster of training.

With 24/7/365 access to more than 1,000 high-quality courses centered on tech and self-development topics, the toughest choice will be where to begin. 

While much of the training covers tech learning in areas like web development, cyber security, cloud computing, and more, there’s also plenty of coursework in segments like the blockchain, growth hacking, iOS development, and beyond. Or you can get up to speed on some of the most popular software in use today, including Adobe Creative Cloud, Microsoft Excel, the Unity game development engine, and more.

Both components together are a nearly $750 value, but right now, you can score The Unlimited Lifetime Learning Subscription Bundle ft. Rosetta Stone at a fraction of that price. If you use the coupon code ROSETTA during checkout before 11:59 p.m. on Aug. 13, you’ll get another $30 off your price, cutting your final total to just $159.97.

 

The Unlimited Lifetime Learning Subscription Bundle ft. Rosetta Stone – $189.99

Get It Now for $159.97

Prices subject to change.
